rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0001
rows.name: Internal defense system, final phase, initiating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Y-You scum[ST:wide ]—
Did you not want to destroy them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0003
rows.name: Earth's humanity... from this universe[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0004
rows.name: Sorry[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Humans are things that change.
Bodies too[ST:wide ]— and hearts too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0006
rows.name: You unprincipled primitive[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0007
rows.name:
So saying Earthlings should have perished back then
was a lie![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Originally, if you guys hadn't started your
shootout near Earth, none of this would have[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0009
rows.name:
Unfortunately, there's only 20 million here.
The remaining 9.98 billion people's grudge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'll have you pay it off in full!
Luxaar![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0011
rows.name: Ugh-wooooah[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0012
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—Lao-san![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0013
rows.name:
No!
Quickly, get Lao![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0014
rows.name: Guoooooooh[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0015
rows.name:
This is[ST:wide ]— Earthling genes.
As I thought, the myths were[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0016
rows.name: Wait right there[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0017
rows.name: Lao-san[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0018
rows.name:
I[ST:wide ]— thought those who survived
through the Earth Life Colonization Project were false lives[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0019
rows.name:
I thought Earthlings should share their fate with Earth.
But, that wasn't it[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0020
rows.name:
Even if they are [System:Ruby rt=B.B.s ]Blue Bloods[/System:Ruby],
people were living desperately on this planet[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0021
rows.name:
What arrived on Mira was[ST:wide ]—
not lives that failed to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0022
rows.name:
They were seeds of life that should sprout in a new universe.
I finally realized[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0023
rows.name:
What is this[ST:wide ]—
Life... all life on Earth is inside me[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0024
rows.name: Aaaaaah[ST:wide ]—!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0025
rows.name:
The genetic information of Earth's creatures is[ST:wide ]—
We have to stop him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0026
rows.name: Everyone[ST:wide ]— Stop!![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Move aside, Lin[ST:wide ]—
We cannot let him destroy the Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0028
rows.name: This time[ST:wide ]— I will shoot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0029
rows.name: But... But[ST:wide ]—![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0030
rows.name: Elma is right[ST:wide ]— Lin[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0031
rows.name:
This body[ST:wide ]— no longer obeys my will.
Please, Lin[ST:wide ]— stop me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Don't let me destroy the Earth Life Colonization Project[ST:wide ]—
Don't let me destroy the potential of Earth's humanity[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0034
rows.name:
I'll say it one more time.
Move aside, Lin![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0036
rows.name: No[ST:wide ]— I will fight too[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0037
rows.name: I will stop him[ST:wide ]— for Lao-san's sake too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0038
rows.name: You too... will join me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12130100_MSG0039
rows.name: Thank you[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]
